features: 【Toothbrush with 3 Switchable Intensity Levels】Press and hold the mode button of electric toothbrush for 3s to switch between vibration intensity. For those with sensitive teeth or gums, the gentle mode can help minimize discomfort during brushing. Those who prioritize oral health can choose the standard mode for a thorough oral care experience. And those aiming for a deep cleaning experience can choose the strong mode, providing a superior level of oral hygiene

【Experience a Deep Clean with Sonic Toothbrush】Our electric toothbrush heads utilize ultrasonic technology to generate high vibrations at 40,000 VPM. This sonic power, combined with the oscillation of the bristles, ensures a thorough and comfortable deep cleaning of your teeth. Plus, with an additional deep cleaning brush head included, you can enjoy a unique cleaning method for even more effective oral cleaning. Discover a whole new level of brushing teeth experience

【Once Charge for 90 Days of Use】Simply put your sonic toothbrush into the charger stand, and begin to charge. A 10-hour charge provides 90 days of usage. Compared to USB charging, the charging stand ensures the reliable charging process of your electric toothbrushes. Beyond charging, It is base also serves as a handy storage solution for your sonic electric toothbrush, offering a convenient, and organized experience for both charging and storing

【5 Modes Personalized Oral Care】The Clean mode of rechargeable toothbrush ensures thorough oral cleaning for maintaining overall oral health; the Whitening brightens tooth color, achieving a teeth-whitening effect; the Polish helps enhance tooth surface appearance, offering an added cosmetic benefit; the Gum Care prioritizes gum health, delivering a gradual brushing experience; and the Sensitive provides a gentler brushing experience, suitable for those with tooth sensitivity

【Encouraging Good Habits and IPX7 Waterproof】The electronic toothbrush comes equipped with a 2-minute brushing timer that ensures ample brushing time, effectively addressing teeth, crevices, and gum lines for an improved cleaning outcome. Simultaneously, the timer aids in cultivating positive brushing habits. Additionally, the electric toothbrush features a 7-level waterproof capability, allowing for shower use or rinsing the toothbrush under the faucet, enhancing its user-friendly convenience.

【A Practical and Health-Beneficial Gift】The 7MAGIC electric toothbrush is packed with advanced technological features, making it an incredibly practical present suitable for everyone. It's a perfect choice for special occasions such as Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, Birthdays, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and more, as a thoughtful way to express care and affection

【Toothbrush Package Included】1*7MAGIC Sonic Electric Toothbrush, 6*replaceable brush heads (5*DuPont brush heads + 1*deep cleaning brush head), 1*toothbrush hanger, 1*charging stand(please note: adapter not included), and 1 user manual. If you have any question, please login your amazon account > choose "Your orders" > find the order ID > click "Contact seller

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose 7MAGIC electric toothbrushes? 1. Enhanced Cleaning: The 7MAGIC electric toothbrushes can thoroughly clean teeth, gums, and the oral cavity more effectively in a shorter period of time compared to manual toothbrushes. 2. Convenience and Ease of Use: With an sonic toothbrush, you only need to place the brush head on your teeth, letting the motion of the toothbrushes do the cleaning. This convenience is particularly valuable for individuals with dental issues or limited mobility. 3. Encouraging Good Habits: Electric toothbrush for adults may contribute to better brushing habits, as they often come equipped with built-in timers to ensure brushing time meets recommended standards. 4. Professional Recommendations: Many dentists and oral health professionals recommend using electronic toothbrush because of their ability to effectively remove dental plaque and prevent cavities, thus contributing to overall oral health maintenance.

3 Levels of Vibrational Modes to Choose From 1. Gentle Vibrational Mode: This mode employs a gentler vibrational frequency and brush motion, minimizing irritation to teeth and gums while providing a soothing brushing experience. It's ideal for individuals with tooth or gum sensitivity and those new to electric toothbrushes. 2. Standard Vibrational Mode: Offering a comprehensive oral cleaning effect, this mode effectively removes food residues and dental plaque from tooth surfaces. It suits individuals with good oral health and those aiming for an all-encompassing oral cleaning routine. 3. Powerful Vibrational Mode: Providing more intense vibrations and an effective oral cleaning experience, this mode aids in removing stubborn stains such as pigments, tea, or coffee stains from tooth surfaces. It's recommended for individuals seeking a thorough oral cleaning routine.

5 Brushing Modes and Their Benefits 1. Clean Mode: The clean mode of an electric toothbrush for adults offers a thorough and comprehensive oral cleaning, helping reduce plaque buildup, and promote gum health. It's suitable for those seeking comprehensive oral hygiene and preventive care. 2. Whitening Mode: Designed specifically, the whitening mode removes surface stains, brightens tooth color, and enhances cosmetic effects. It's ideal for individuals who frequently consume coffee, tea, or dark-colored beverages. 3. Sensitive Mode: The sensitive mode is tailored for individuals with sensitive teeth or gum issues. It offers a gentler brushing experience, alleviating tooth sensitivity. It's also suitable for those who have undergone restorations or cleanings and require more delicate care. 4. Polish Mode: The polish mode aims to deliver an additional polishing effect, eliminating tooth surface stains such as pigments, coffee or tea stains, resulting in smoother and glossier teeth. This mode is for those aiming to enhance the appearance and shine of their teeth. 5. Gum Care Mode: The gum care mode provides extra care for gums, helping reduce gum bleeding issues and enhancing gum health. It's suitable for individuals with sensitive gum health and those aiming to maintain optimal gum well-being.

Benefits of Dual-Sided Vibrational Brushing and deep-cleaning brush head Brush Head Separation with Dual-sided Vibrational Motion: A Novel Design in Magnetic Levitation Rechargeable Toothbrush. 1. Comprehensive Cleaning: Simultaneously cleans different areas of teeth, including the tooth surfaces, interdental spaces, and gum line. 2. Enhanced Efficiency: Cleans more tooth surfaces in less time, improving overall brushing efficiency. 3. Deep Cleaning: Reaches into interdental spaces and difficult-to-access areas, removing stubborn plaque and stains.

Charging Dock Convenience 1. Ease of Use: Typically designed for user-friendly operation. Placing the sonic electric toothbrush onto the dock is all that's needed to initiate charging. 2. Space Efficiency: Charging docks not only serve as charging stations but also provide a designated spot to store your electric toothbrush. This dual functionality helps save valuable countertop space. 2-Minute Timer with 30-Second Pause Reminder 1. Ensuring Thorough Brushing: The 2-minute timer aligns with dental recommendations for optimal brushing time, typically around 2 minutes per session. 2. Even Brushing: The 30-second pause reminders prompt users to allocate sufficient time to different areas, ensuring uniform cleaning across all tooth surfaces. 3. Cultivating Good Habits: Incorporating this timer and pause system aids users in developing the habit of maintaining a full 2-minute brushing routine during each session. IPX7 Waterproof Feature 1. Easy Cleaning: You can conveniently rinse the adult toothbrush directly under the tap, simplifying the cleaning process. 2. Shower-Friendly: Use the rechargeable sonic toothbrush during showers for added convenience, seamlessly integrating into your bathing routine. 3. Outdoor Usage: For those who prefer brushing outdoors, the waterproof design eliminates worries about external elements affecting the toothbrush's performance.

Extra 1 deep-cleaning toothbrush head We also provide an additional deep cleaning toothbrush heads, engineered with intensified vibrations and larger oscillation amplitude. This design ensures the effective removal of stubborn stains and plaque, while also addressing interdental gaps and crevices, taking care of the gum line, enhancing the overall oral care experience, and enabling periodic deep cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the 7MAGIC Electric Toothbrush for a few days now and I am very impressed with its performance. It has 3 intensity levels and 5 modes to suit different needs and preferences. I usually use the standard mode with medium intensity, and it feels like a professional cleaning every time. The toothbrush heads are very soft and gentle on my gums, and they have a color change indicator to remind me when to replace them. The battery life is amazing, as I only need to charge it once every 60 days. The charging stand is also very convenient and stable. The toothbrush is waterproof and has a sleek design that looks great in my bathroom. It also comes with a travel case and 6 extra brush heads, which is a great value for money. I would highly recommend this toothbrush to anyone looking for a sonic toothbrush that delivers a deep and comfortable cleaning experience. It is definitely worth the 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely delighted with my purchase of the black rechargeable toothbrush! This product is a game-changer in oral care. The sleek black design not only looks stylish in my bathroom but also exudes durability. The inclusion of six replacement brush heads is a fantastic value-add, ensuring longevity without the need for frequent replacements. What truly sets this toothbrush apart is its exceptional battery life. A single charge seems to last forever, making it incredibly convenient for daily use and travel alike. The brushing experience is both gentle and effective, leaving my teeth feeling clean and refreshed. I appreciate the thoughtfulness behind the multiple brushing modes, allowing for a customized experience. Overall, this black rechargeable toothbrush has exceeded my expectations, offering a perfect blend of style, functionality, and longevity. It's a five-star product that I highly recommend to anyone seeking a reliable and long-lasting oral care solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent toothbrush at a GREAT price!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a few electric toothbrushes over the years but never thought they were that great. I heard this one was good and figured I’d give it a try. Wow, was I surprised! It really does a fantastic job and you can tailor it to suit your best needs. It comes with 6 brush heads, a brush head cover, wall hanger, charging stand with cord, and the unit itself. The best part is that it not only has 5 different cleaning modes, but also 3 power levels for each mode. It saves the last setting for the next use too. It’s a bit tricky adjusting the modes and power, but the instructions are well written. The speed of movement is amazingly fast, which is different from others I’ve tried. You do not have to keep it in the charging base, as it claims to hold a charge for 60 days and that makes it great for travel and leaving the charger behind. The quality is excellent, it does a fantastic job, and the price is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this electric toothbrush because it seemed like it would be exactly what I was looking for and it definitely delivered. The toothbrush itself is fantastic and for the quality it is an amazing price. This toothbrush has 5 different modes that change the way the toothbrush vibrates to optimize different cleaning styles. The different modes do definitely offer a different feel for what you are looking for. It has just the right amount of power to where it is very comfortable to use. I like that for the price it also comes with 6 brush heads, one of them being a different deep cleaning design. It also has an optional wall mount and a brush protector. The charging base is nice and light and does exactly what it is supposed to. Battery lasts a long time and I have had no issues with it running out since I usually put it on the charger weekly. Prior to this I used a competitor brand, and it was always really noisy. This toothbrush is actually a lot quieter and just makes a soft bussing. I highly recommend this toothbrush if you are looking for an inexpensive rechargeable toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dentist recommended a pulsating brush, specifically one with a gum cleaning setting. The best parts: it includes multiple settings, 6 heads plus a head cap and charging station, and of course, price.The negatives are that the wall mount doesn’t hold it securely (so I don’t use it) and the charging station has a USB with no wall plug. We have many wall plugs at my house and they’re easy to come by, but it would’ve been nice to have one included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game Changer for Dental Hygiene: 7MAGIC Electric Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for the details. Here's a review for the 7MAGIC toothbrush designed for adults and teens, featuring a brushing timer and powered by corded electric with medium firmness:---i recently purchased the 7MAGIC electric toothbrush, and it has completely transformed my oral care routine. As someone who has struggled with maintaining consistent brushing habits, the built-in timer feature of this toothbrush is a godsend. It ensures that I brush for the dentist-recommended two minutes, making my brushing sessions more effective and thorough.The medium firmness of the bristles is perfect for my needs. It's gentle enough not to cause any gum irritation, yet firm enough to effectively remove plaque and surface stains. I've noticed a significant improvement in the cleanliness of my teeth and the health of my gums since I started using it.The power source being corded electric is extremely convenient. I don't have to worry about batteries running out or losing power mid-brush. The toothbrush always delivers consistent performance, which is something I value highly.One aspect that really stands out is the design. It's sleek, modern, and very easy to handle. The toothbrush feels comfortable in my hand, and maneuvering it around my mouth is effortless.In conclusion, the 7MAGIC electric toothbrush is a fantastic investment for both adults and teens. It promotes better dental hygiene habits through its timer feature, has just the right bristle firmness for effective cleaning, and its corded electric power source ensures reliability. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to upgrade their oral care routine.
